meanings.def: an important development that may lead to an agreement or achievement
examples: a major breakthrough in cancer research
The new deal represents a major breakthrough for the company.
We have achieved a real breakthrough in the search for peace.
a significant breakthrough in computer design

meanings.def: in which a performer or type of product is successful for the first time, when it is likely to be even more successful in the future
examples: It was a breakthrough album for the band.
an award for the best breakthrough band
The emphasis is on developing breakthrough technology that will lead to new business.
